relation: Sergio Romo starts the inning for the Giants.
Carlos Ruiz doubled to left. Runner on second with none out and Freddy Galvis due up.
Freddy Galvis sacrifice bunt to pitcher. On the play, Carlos Ruiz advances to third. Runner on third with one out and Cliff Lee due up.
Jim Thome is pinch-hitting for Cliff Lee.
Pinch-Hitter Jim Thome struck out swinging. Runner on third with two outs and Juan Pierre due up.
John Mayberry is pinch-hitting for Juan Pierre
Pinch-Hitter John Mayberry grounded out short to first to end the inning.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {36135=Lee became the first Phillies starting pitcher to throw more than nine innings in a game since Terry Mullholland in May of 1993, and also became the first Phillies hurler to toss 10 scoreless innings since Steve Carlton in 1981.}
